TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Sergio_Mattarella, title = Sergio_Mattarella, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sergio_Mattarella} }

S.FORM: = Sergio Mattarella = Mntucing hngkawas 1941 idas 7 jiyax 23 ka Sergio Mattarella ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Italy ta sayang o kiya ka Sergio Mattarella, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 2 jiyax 3 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Sergio Mattarella = Sergio Mattarella (kari Italy: Sergio Mattarella, phnang kari Italy: ('sɛrdʒo matta'rɛlla), kngkawas 1941 idas 7 diyax 23－), Italy mtseyji, kngkawas 2015 idas 2 diyax 3 psdhuwan phiyu tu12 Soto Italy. Sergio Mattarella u kngkawas 1983 dhuq kngkawas 2008 ka ngalan giying, kngkawas 1989 dhuq kngkawas 1990 mnngalan Kyoikubu Bucyo, kngkawas 1999 dhuq kngkawas 2001 ngalan Kwohwangbu Bucyo. Kngkawas 2011 ngalan Italy Keyngpo Hoying Knbeyhing Hwakwan. Kndusan Sergio Mattarella pa mntuting Palermo kingal niqan bay hnhangan msllutuc tnsapah Sicily. Niqan bay hnhangan Teynskyo mtseyji ka tama niya Bernardo, kiya ka pnhiyu Italy Teyngskyo Mincu Tang uri, mnngalan Gasperi Neyke na Bucyo. Qbsuran snaw na Piersanti Mattarella u kngkawas 1978 cida nngalan Sicily Cusi, kngkawas 1980 cida wada phqilun Sicily Mqalux Bawa Tang. Cyawhu niya ka dangi tama na Salvatore Aldisio. Salvatore Aldisio u mn Italy Jnmin Tang na Huku Tang Cusi, mniq brah bay kngkawas cida mnuda pqraqil biyax seyhu Fascism; babaw Tumn2 Mccbu Knbeyhing Qnlangan daw, Salvatore Aldisio u wada mnsnburah phiyu Pnwaya Italy Mincu pusu balay mpdudul niya. Kndusan seyji Kngkkawas 1980 1980年代 Kndusan quri seyji Sergio Mattarella pa kndadax kngkawas 1983 prading, cida Sergio Mattarella u dkuhan Italy Teyngskyo Mincu Tang wada mangal Italy Cong Giying Giying. So kawas daw, Sergio Mattarella cida u sdurun Tyeynmin Tang (Italy Teyngskyo Mincu Tang) Misucang Siriaco De Mita, muda "Pssinaw" kcka Tang Cida Sicily Tang dha, kiya ka muda ptalax dndulan Mqalux Bawa Tang. Psdhuwan phiyu Congri cida ka Tyeynmin Tang (Italy Teyngskyo Mincu Tang) Giovanni Golia wada ngalan Gikay Swubu Bucyo ka Sergio Mattarella, Sergio Mattarella mniq kngkawas 1989 wada ngalan tu6 Giulio Andreotti pnhyuwan na Kyoibu Bucyo. Kngkawas 1990 cida, spuda Italy Kwohuy wada puda "Cayhu Hwaan", hwaan niyi u wada ptrawah qqpahan meyti Italy, Sergio Mattarella mi duma Bucyo u wada msupu malax qpahun dha, ini sruwa ka dhiya mi qnita dha quri niyi u meyti taheng Berlusconi na 1 kluwanan seyji twosyey ka niyi. Diyax iyax mnSoto Mangal Soto當選總統 Kngkawas 2015 idas 1 diyax 31, Sergio Mattarella u mniq kcka tumn4 meytaq hyo pa 1009 hyo ka hyo sediq mpbeytaq Kwohuy u, wada mangal 665 hyo mi mbiyax mangal burah Italy Konghkwo Soto. Mntxan seyngkyo niyi pa wada mangal dnkuhan snpeyyah Mincu Tang, Burah Tukcka Narac Palic Tang, Unau Kongmin Tang, Congyang Ryeynmong mi Tuiwil Palic Kndkilan Mtrawah uri. Kngkawas 2015 idas 5 diyax 6, Sergio Mattarella u wada psdhu matas wada splawa Italicum na Burah Italy Pnwaya Seyngkyo, pnwaya kiya u wada pwaya 1 quri Mn2 Seyngkyo na Pnwaya Hangan Piri Mpririh, kiya uri u Pnway Quri Knou Hyo Nseyngkyo mi 3% na sbrahun hqngawan; hosweynjn u malu mniq 100 niqan pkla hangan na hbaraw hiyi sediq muda seyngkyo, binaw txtaxa cngtang mnuda unau tu1 mangal na hosweynjn u ini spuwi kiya. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 4, Italy u muda Keyngpo Kongto. Pusa hangan kongto ka: Ya smruwa knpriyux keyngpo Italy Keyngpo, kiya ka muda snburah knpriyux Italy Kwohuy na biyax mi pnssliyan, kiya mi qnlhangan, nniqan mi duma kcka singcng sti psasu biyax. Kngkawas 2018 Kwohuy Seyngkyo Mi Pssli Phiyu Seyhu. 2018 Qnlqilan Seyhi kngkawas 2019 2019年政治危機 Kngkawas 2019 idas, Huku Congri Matteo Salvini pusa kari snquri Giuseppe Conte ini snhiyi tonggi, knrinah mumal tnbrah niya hbaraw bnbur uuda kcka Tang. Hbaraw balay mpspu seyji niyas qmita, pusa kari quri ini snhiyi tonggi ka alaw smatang pknama seyngkyo, kiya ka muda pkmalu Tukcka Narac Palic Ryeynmong hnyuwan niya mniq kcka gikay, muda sndhu mpmusa Congri babaw niya ka Matteo Salvini. Idas 8 diyax 20, mniq kcka Gikay pnsung kari cida, Giuseppe Conte u wada mchdil bay kari rmngaw Matteo Salvini ka 1 seyji cihuy cuyi niya, 'Hiya u wana nanaq bbrihan niya mi dmudul seyji mqraqil', kiya daw wada snquri Sergio Mattarella malax qpahun niya. Sergio Mattarella u prading muda mpprngaw txtaxa pnssliyan Gikay. Mniq iyax Sergio Mattarella tuhuy Gikay mpprngaw cida, 5 Pngerah Undo mi Mincu Tang ddha dha u ya bay wada pcriyu knou bay snhiyi hyo. Idas 8 diyax 28 cida, mpdudul niya Mincu Tang Nicola Zingaretti pkla kari hiya u musa dmkuh Giuseppe Conte lmutuc burah pusu tunux mpdudul seyhu. So kusun, Sergio Mattarella pa splawa niya pprngaw kari ka Giuseppe Conte, hmuruc hiya mi spuda hiya muda lmutuc dmudul burah Neyke. Idas 9 diyax 4, Giuseppe Conte u pkla kari pnsliyan na burah Neyke, kiya mi mniq so kusun daw mniq Quirinale Kong psdhu phiyu. Kngkawas 2019 idas 9 diyax 9, Italy Conggiying pa 343 hyo ka smruwa, 263 hyo ka ini sruwa, 3 hyo ka malix niyax, wada muda snquri dha snhiyi seyhu. Kngkawas 2019 idas 9 diyax 10, mniq kcka Sanggiying tumn2 meytaq hyo snhiyi cida, 169 hiyi giying ka meytaq hyo smruwa burah seyhu, 133 hiyi giying ka meytaq ini sruwan hyo. Iyax dndulan narux Narux Brah Cyokoku Uhan cida. 中國武漢肺炎(COVID-19新冠肺炎) Covid-19流行期間 Mniq iyax ngalan Soto ka Sergio Mattarella cida, Italy u wada muda pspuruq hidoyi bay Narux Brah Cyokoku Uhan (COVID-19). Kngkawas 2020 idas 2, Italy pa wada ruwan Narux Brah Cyokuko Uhan knhbaraw bay qnlhangan uri. Dhuq kngkawas 2020 idas 12, wada balay bay klaun u hmrinas 1,800,000 hiyi sediq ka ruwan Narux Brah Uhan (COVID-19) mi 66,000 hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang dsan narux niyi, pusu balay ulan Narux Brah Uhan (COVID-19) ka alang mkbrnux u Lombardia, Emilia, Romagna, Veneto mi Piedmont uri dtudaya Tacyu. Idas 2 diyax 22, Giuseppe Conte Neyke muda pkla kari 1 hhtur quri dndulan Narux Brah Cyokoku Uhan (COVID-19) na ang, snpeyyah Italy tudaya 11 ini pntna alang mkbrnux u 5 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka psthyaqan psanak. Kiya mi wada so mkpiya diyax daw shmuk ka knkana qnlhangan sapah pyasan mi pyasan tubeyhing. Kngkawas 2020 idas 3 diyax 8, seyhu Italy u wada pkrnaun knkana alang mkbrnux Lombardia mi kana 14 tudaya niya Snghun uri ka psthyaqan psanak, wada shmuk ka hmrinas 1/4 hiyi sediq qnlhangan. So kusun daw, wada pqriyun seyhu knkana qnlhangan ka uuda psthiyaq psanak. Mniq cida u wada ngalan rikisi ssdiq knbeyhing bay uuda pphmuk. Idas 5 diyax 18, wada mhdu ka pphmuk, wada srwanan seyhu ka mmahan sinaw, sanan mkan uqun, sanan psaqic snunux mi sanan pskbiyax hiyi u wada snburah prading qmpah dungan. Idas 6 diyax 3 muda snrahun duma ka duma nniqqan mi muda pprngaw quri ya malu ka quri mppriwaw ka knkingal alang. Kngkawas 2021 idas 1 diyax 13, alaw Pnspuwan Seyhu snquri tqlahang Narux Brah Cyokoku Uhan (COVID-19) mi pnwaya pstutuy qnlhangan keykaku bnatas ang u mtdha mcida ka qnita dha, kiya daw Matteo Renzi u pusa kari mtalax ccng ryeynmong ka Italy Hwori Tang, kiya ka seyhu Giuseppe Conte u wada uka knhbaraw dha mniq kcka Italy Sanggiying. Idas 1 diyax 18, 19, seyhu Giuseppe Conte mniq Italy Conggiying mi Italy Sanggiying u wana mbiyax tikuh balay muda meytaq hyo snhiyi. Binaw alaw seyhu Sergio Mattarella pa wada uka knhbrawan nniqan dha mniq Italy Sanggiying, nasi ini dkuhi knhbrawan hiyi Sanggiying daw, knou cngce u musa uka brahan ouda kana uri da. Idas 1 diyax 26, Giuseppe Conte u snquri Sergio Mattarella pusa patas malax qpahun niya. Idas 2 diyax 3, Sergio Mattarella psdhu biyax brah Italy Congyang Ginghang mi brah Oco Congyang Ginhang Congcay Mario Draghi (kari Italy: Mario Draghi) muda snburah phiyu 1 seyhu Neyke. Kndusan niya個人生活 Sergio Mattarella u msupu Marisa Chiazzese msturung, Chiazzese msturung u mptusa Waya Romaswey, Pyasan Tubeyhing Yingcyo Lauro Chiazzese na wouwa niya qridin. Wada mrdang kngkawas 2012 ka qridin niya Marisa. Niqan 3 ka laqi niya, kiya ka: Laura ( Mniq tama niya ngalands Soto cida muda dmaya Tu1 hujn qridin Soto quri uuda qqpahun waya) Francisco mi Bernardo II. Ndanan seyngkyo Kwohuy giying seyngkyo國會議員選舉 Soto seyngkyo總統選舉

= Sergio Mattarella = Mntocing hngkawas 1941 idas 7 jiyax 23 ka Sergio Mattarella ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Italy ta sayang o kiya ka Sergio Mattarella, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 2 jiyax 3 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Sergio Mattarella = Sergio Mattarella (kari Italy: Sergio Mattarella, phnang kari Italy: ('sɛrdʒo matta'rɛlla), kngkawas 1941 idas 7 diyax 23－), Italy mtseyji, kngkawas 2015 idas 2 diyax 3 psdhowan phiyo to12 Soto Italy. Sergio Mattarella o kngkawas 1983 dhoq kngkawas 2008 ka ngalan giying, kngkawas 1989 dhoq kngkawas 1990 mnngalan Kyoikobo Bocyo, kngkawas 1999 dhoq kngkawas 2001 ngalan Kwohwangbo Bocyo. Kngkawas 2011 ngalan Italy Keyngpo Hoying Knbeyhing Hwakwan. Kndosan Sergio Mattarella pa mntoting Palermo kingal niqan bay hnhangan msllotoc tnsapah Sicily. Niqan bay hnhangan Teynskyo mtseyji ka tama niya Bernardo, kiya ka pnhiyo Italy Teyngskyo Minco Tang ori, mnngalan Gasperi Neyke na Bocyo. Qbsoran snaw na Piersanti Mattarella o kngkawas 1978 cida nngalan Sicily Cosi, kngkawas 1980 cida wada phqilon Sicily Mqalox Bawa Tang. Cyawho niya ka dangi tama na Salvatore Aldisio. Salvatore Aldisio o mn Italy Jnmin Tang na Hoko Tang Cosi, mniq brah bay kngkawas cida mnoda pqraqil biyax seyho Fascism; babaw Tomn2 Mccbo Knbeyhing Qnlangan daw, Salvatore Aldisio o wada mnsnborah phiyo Pnwaya Italy Minco poso balay mpdodol niya. Kndosan seyji Kngkkawas 1980 1980年代 Kndosan qori seyji Sergio Mattarella pa kndadax kngkawas 1983 prading, cida Sergio Mattarella o dkohan Italy Teyngskyo Minco Tang wada mangal Italy Cong Giying Giying. So kawas daw, Sergio Mattarella cida o sdoron Tyeynmin Tang (Italy Teyngskyo Minco Tang) Misocang Siriaco De Mita, moda "Pssinaw" kcka Tang Cida Sicily Tang dha, kiya ka moda ptalax dndolan Mqalox Bawa Tang. Psdhowan phiyo Congri cida ka Tyeynmin Tang (Italy Teyngskyo Minco Tang) Giovanni Golia wada ngalan Gikay Swobo Bocyo ka Sergio Mattarella, Sergio Mattarella mniq kngkawas 1989 wada ngalan to6 Giolio Andreotti pnhyowan na Kyoibo Bocyo. Kngkawas 1990 cida, spoda Italy Kwohoy wada poda "Cayho Hwaan", hwaan niyi o wada ptrawah qqpahan meyti Italy, Sergio Mattarella mi doma Bocyo o wada msopo malax qpahon dha, ini srowa ka dhiya mi qnita dha qori niyi o meyti taheng Berlosconi na 1 klowanan seyji twosyey ka niyi. Diyax iyax mnSoto Mangal Soto當選總統 Kngkawas 2015 idas 1 diyax 31, Sergio Mattarella o mniq kcka tomn4 meytaq hyo pa 1009 hyo ka hyo sediq mpbeytaq Kwohoy o, wada mangal 665 hyo mi mbiyax mangal borah Italy Konghkwo Soto. Mntxan seyngkyo niyi pa wada mangal dnkohan snpeyyah Minco Tang, Borah Tokcka Narac Palic Tang, Unao Kongmin Tang, Congyang Ryeynmong mi Toiwil Palic Kndkilan Mtrawah ori. Kngkawas 2015 idas 5 diyax 6, Sergio Mattarella o wada psdho matas wada splawa Italicom na Borah Italy Pnwaya Seyngkyo, pnwaya kiya o wada pwaya 1 qori Mn2 Seyngkyo na Pnwaya Hangan Piri Mpririh, kiya ori o Pnway Qori Knoo Hyo Nseyngkyo mi 3% na sbrahon hqngawan; hosweynjn o malo mniq 100 niqan pkla hangan na hbaraw hiyi sediq moda seyngkyo, binaw txtaxa cngtang mnoda onao to1 mangal na hosweynjn o ini spowi kiya. Kngkawas 2016 idas 12 diyax 4, Italy o moda Keyngpo Kongto. Posa hangan kongto ka: Ya smrowa knpriyox keyngpo Italy Keyngpo, kiya ka moda snborah knpriyox Italy Kwohoy na biyax mi pnssliyan, kiya mi qnlhangan, nniqan mi doma kcka singcng sti psaso biyax. Kngkawas 2018 Kwohoy Seyngkyo Mi Pssli Phiyo Seyho. 2018 Qnlqilan Seyhi kngkawas 2019 2019年政治危機 Kngkawas 2019 idas, Hoko Congri Matteo Salvini posa kari snqori Gioseppe Conte ini snhiyi tonggi, knrinah momal tnbrah niya hbaraw bnbor ooda kcka Tang. Hbaraw balay mpspo seyji niyas qmita, posa kari qori ini snhiyi tonggi ka alaw smatang pknama seyngkyo, kiya ka moda pkmalo Tokcka Narac Palic Ryeynmong hnyowan niya mniq kcka gikay, moda sndho mpmosa Congri babaw niya ka Matteo Salvini. Idas 8 diyax 20, mniq kcka Gikay pnsong kari cida, Gioseppe Conte o wada mchdil bay kari rmngaw Matteo Salvini ka 1 seyji cihoy coyi niya, 'Hiya o wana nanaq bbrihan niya mi dmodol seyji mqraqil', kiya daw wada snqori Sergio Mattarella malax qpahon niya. Sergio Mattarella o prading moda mpprngaw txtaxa pnssliyan Gikay. Mniq iyax Sergio Mattarella tohoy Gikay mpprngaw cida, 5 Pngerah Undo mi Minco Tang ddha dha o ya bay wada pcriyo knoo bay snhiyi hyo. Idas 8 diyax 28 cida, mpdodol niya Minco Tang Nicola Zingaretti pkla kari hiya o mosa dmkoh Gioseppe Conte lmotoc borah poso tonox mpdodol seyho. So koson, Sergio Mattarella pa splawa niya pprngaw kari ka Gioseppe Conte, hmoroc hiya mi spoda hiya moda lmotoc dmodol borah Neyke. Idas 9 diyax 4, Gioseppe Conte o pkla kari pnsliyan na borah Neyke, kiya mi mniq so koson daw mniq Qoirinale Kong psdho phiyo. Kngkawas 2019 idas 9 diyax 9, Italy Conggiying pa 343 hyo ka smrowa, 263 hyo ka ini srowa, 3 hyo ka malix niyax, wada moda snqori dha snhiyi seyho. Kngkawas 2019 idas 9 diyax 10, mniq kcka Sanggiying tomn2 meytaq hyo snhiyi cida, 169 hiyi giying ka meytaq hyo smrowa borah seyho, 133 hiyi giying ka meytaq ini srowan hyo. Iyax dndolan narox Narox Brah Cyokoko Uhan cida. 中國武漢肺炎(COVID-19新冠肺炎) Covid-19流行期間 Mniq iyax ngalan Soto ka Sergio Mattarella cida, Italy o wada moda psporoq hidoyi bay Narox Brah Cyokoko Uhan (COVID-19). Kngkawas 2020 idas 2, Italy pa wada rowan Narox Brah Cyokoko Uhan knhbaraw bay qnlhangan ori. Dhoq kngkawas 2020 idas 12, wada balay bay klaon o hmrinas 1,800,000 hiyi sediq ka rowan Narox Brah Uhan (COVID-19) mi 66,000 hiyi sediq ka wada mrdang dsan narox niyi, poso balay olan Narox Brah Uhan (COVID-19) ka alang mkbrnox o Lombardia, Emilia, Romagna, Veneto mi Piedmont ori dtodaya Tacyo. Idas 2 diyax 22, Gioseppe Conte Neyke moda pkla kari 1 hhtor qori dndolan Narox Brah Cyokoko Uhan (COVID-19) na ang, snpeyyah Italy todaya 11 ini pntna alang mkbrnox o 5 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka psthyaqan psanak. Kiya mi wada so mkpiya diyax daw shmok ka knkana qnlhangan sapah pyasan mi pyasan tobeyhing. Kngkawas 2020 idas 3 diyax 8, seyho Italy o wada pkrnaon knkana alang mkbrnox Lombardia mi kana 14 todaya niya Snghon ori ka psthyaqan psanak, wada shmok ka hmrinas 1/4 hiyi sediq qnlhangan. So koson daw, wada pqriyon seyho knkana qnlhangan ka ooda psthiyaq psanak. Mniq cida o wada ngalan rikisi ssdiq knbeyhing bay ooda pphmok. Idas 5 diyax 18, wada mhdo ka pphmok, wada srwanan seyho ka mmahan sinaw, sanan mkan oqon, sanan psaqic snonox mi sanan pskbiyax hiyi o wada snborah prading qmpah dongan. Idas 6 diyax 3 moda snrahon doma ka doma nniqqan mi moda pprngaw qori ya malo ka qori mppriwaw ka knkingal alang. Kngkawas 2021 idas 1 diyax 13, alaw Pnspowan Seyho snqori tqlahang Narox Brah Cyokoko Uhan (COVID-19) mi pnwaya pstotoy qnlhangan keykako bnatas ang o mtdha mcida ka qnita dha, kiya daw Matteo Renzi o posa kari mtalax ccng ryeynmong ka Italy Hwori Tang, kiya ka seyho Gioseppe Conte o wada oka knhbaraw dha mniq kcka Italy Sanggiying. Idas 1 diyax 18, 19, seyho Gioseppe Conte mniq Italy Conggiying mi Italy Sanggiying o wana mbiyax tikoh balay moda meytaq hyo snhiyi. Binaw alaw seyho Sergio Mattarella pa wada oka knhbrawan nniqan dha mniq Italy Sanggiying, nasi ini dkohi knhbrawan hiyi Sanggiying daw, knoo cngce o mosa oka brahan ooda kana ori da. Idas 1 diyax 26, Gioseppe Conte o snqori Sergio Mattarella posa patas malax qpahon niya. Idas 2 diyax 3, Sergio Mattarella psdho biyax brah Italy Congyang Ginghang mi brah Oco Congyang Ginhang Congcay Mario Draghi (kari Italy: Mario Draghi) moda snborah phiyo 1 seyho Neyke. Kndosan niya個人生活 Sergio Mattarella o msopo Marisa Chiazzese mstorong, Chiazzese mstorong o mptosa Waya Romaswey, Pyasan Tobeyhing Yingcyo Laoro Chiazzese na woowa niya qridin. Wada mrdang kngkawas 2012 ka qridin niya Marisa. Niqan 3 ka laqi niya, kiya ka: Laora ( Mniq tama niya ngalands Soto cida moda dmaya To1 hojn qridin Soto qori ooda qqpahon waya) Francisco mi Bernardo II. Ndanan seyngkyo Kwohoy giying seyngkyo國會議員選舉 Soto seyngkyo總統選舉
